Sign in to view My schedule!: Sign in to view My schedule!

Title: Title
Change password to users who have been a: Change password to users who have been already signed in?
Find participants by name, surname or e-: Find participants by name, surname or e-mail.

These users have been removed, but they: These users have been removed, but they still exist in the application. Do you want to remove them?
Password from {user} was not changed bec: Password from {user} was not changed because it was already used to sign in.

There is already the maximum of men.
There is already the maximum of women.
It is not possible to sign out from an e: It is not possible to sign out from an event that has already taken place.
Password reset email has been sent.
Invite users who have already been invit: Invite users who have already been invited?
Before adding to 'My schedule', please s: Before adding to 'My schedule', please sign in first.
Request account deletion by sending emai: Request account deletion by sending email with your credentials to info@festapp.net.
By deleting your companion you will also: By deleting your companion you will also sign him/her out of all signed in sessions.
If you have a child, partner or friend w: If you have a child, partner or friend without a phone, you can sign them in as a companion. They will need a festival band to enter the event. Maximal number of companions is {max_companions}.
Registration failed: Email {email} is al: Registration failed: Email {email} is already in use.
You'll receive an email with a link to r: You'll receive an email with a link to reset your password. Do you want to proceed?
A password reset link has been sent to {: A password reset link has been sent to {email}. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
Point the camera at the attendee's code: Point the camera at the attendee's code for an entry verification.
Heading: Heading
Notifications will inform you about sche: Notifications will inform you about schedule changes and other selected news.
This platform or browser does not suppor: This platform or browser does not support the PWA install prompt or the app is already installed.
Installation failed. Please open this li: Installation failed. Please open this link in your device's default system browser (e.g., Mi Browser or Chrome). Note: Some devices may not support installing web applications.
Processing content and detecting large i: Processing content and detecting large images...
Some images are large and may slow down: Some images are large and may slow down the app. Press OK to convert them into optimal size.
Update the app to the latest version to: Update the app to the latest version to access all features.
At least one user has this service. You: At least one user has this service. You can find them in the grid. Are you sure you want to delete it? Deletion cannot be undone.
To create accommodation, fill in the tit: To create accommodation, fill in the title, unique code, and the reference of the place.
To create food, fill in the title, uniqu: To create food, fill in the title, unique code, and the reference of the event.
Users will get a sign-in code via e-mail: Users will get a sign-in code via e-mail.
Some users have already been invited. Do: Some users have already been invited. Do you want to invite them again and send a new sign-in code?
Sign in to participate in the game.
For playing the game, you must be assign: For playing the game, you must be assigned to a game group
Start time must be earlier than end time: Start time must be earlier than end time.
You are offline. Please check your inter: You are offline. Please check your internet connection.
Are you sure you want to delete this eve: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
Open this website on your Android phone: Open this website on your Android phone in a browser like Chrome or Edge and hit the Install Now button.
Install {title} to get notifications, of: Install {title} to get notifications, offline functionality, and a quick launch icon.
Failed to invite {user}. Number of retri: Failed to invite {user}. Number of retries: ({retries}).
The processing has finished with error.
It is not possible to select more ticket: It is not possible to select more tickets.
Do you want to send the tickets to order: Do you want to send the tickets to orders?
Do you want to change orders to paid?: Do you want to change orders to paid?

Do you want to cancel the selected ticke: Do you want to cancel the selected tickets?
Provide the following link or code to th: Provide the following link or code to the people who will be checking the tickets.
By generating a new code, the old one wi: By generating a new code, the old one will be replaced and will no longer work.
Are you sure you want to unlink this tra: Are you sure you want to unlink this transaction?
Are you sure you want to add this transa: Are you sure you want to add this transaction?
Search by message, account, symbol, name: Search by message, account, symbol, name, or amount
Reservation for the selected event is cu: Reservation for the selected event is currently unavailable.
This form is currently turned off: This form is currently turned off
Are you sure you want to delete this eve: Are you sure you want to delete this event? All the event data will be lost.

Subject: Subject
The link to reset the password: The link to reset the password
This template is used for sending passwo: This template is used for sending password reset instructions.
This template is used for sending sign-i: This template is used for sending sign-in codes.
This template is used to confirm ticket: This template is used to confirm ticket orders.
This template is used to confirm success: This template is used to confirm successful ticket order payments.
This template is used to remind customer: This template is used to remind customers about pending ticket order payments.
This template is used to notify users ab: This template is used to notify users about ticket order cancellations.
Determines whether event details (schedu: Determines whether event details (schedule, info, etc.) are available to the public.
Reservation will be done via this extern: Reservation will be done via this external link.
Links for opening app on different platf: Links for opening app on different platforms.
Table does not contain any items: Table does not contain any items
The price will be displayed on the event: The price will be displayed on the events page.
After payment, a ticket is sent to the u: After payment, a ticket is sent to the user. The ticket can have a custom background and text color.
Allows creating a form to reserve one or: Allows creating a form to reserve one or more seats at an event.
Allows adding companions (partner, child: Allows adding companions (partner, child, or friend without a phone) and signing them up for workshops.
Displays a songbook and allows adding cu: Displays a songbook and allows adding custom songs.
Allows defining teams, stations, and pla: Allows defining teams, stations, and playing a game where team members enter a code to complete a station.
Allows creating groups and scheduling me: Allows creating groups and scheduling meetings for them.
Enables adding program items to favorite: Enables adding program items to favorites.
Allows assigning accommodations to a use: Allows assigning accommodations to a user and displaying them on the user profile.
It is possible to verify users via QR co: It is possible to verify users via QR code on workshops or other limited events.
This feature lets you create a seating b: This feature lets you create a seating blueprint with a limited number of seats for the reservation form. For example, you can design a seating chart for a bus or a layout of a hall with assigned seats.
You must be between {minAge} and {maxAge: You must be between {minAge} and {maxAge} years old.
Warning: Your age is not within the reco: Warning: Your age is not within the recommended range ({minAge}-{maxAge} years old).
Max age cannot be lower than min age.
Various settings for map inside the app.
Allows displaying the program in a table: Allows displaying the program in a table.
Indicates the start time from when peopl: Indicates the start time from when people can sign in for workshops.
This determines whether this event is hi: This determines whether this event is hidden from list views.
Allows customizing event schedule displa: Allows customizing event schedule display settings.
Allows management of activities for volu: Allows management of activities for volunteers.

FeatureSchedule.subtitleEnableChildren: Allows events to be added as part of a parent event.
FeatureSchedule.emptyEventTypes: No event types defined yet. Click 'Add Event Type' to create one.

FeatureImport.importFeatureDescription: Enables importing users from various sources like CSV files or from tickets.
FeatureImport.importFromTicketsConfirm: Are you sure you want to import users from tickets? This might create new users or update existing ones.
FeatureImport.importFromTicketsError: An error occurred during ticket import.
FeatureImport.helperAutoImport: Users will automatically have an account created upon signing up through the form. Default password is '1'.

FeatureFormSettings.title: Form Settings
FeatureFormSettings.helperFormLink: Use only letters, numbers, and hyphens. This will be part of the URL.
FeatureFormSettings.validationLinkInvalidChars: Invalid characters. Use only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
FeatureFormSettings.helperDeadlineDays: Set how many days a user has to pay for an order. Leave empty for no deadline.
FeatureFormSettings.subtitleCardDesign: Toggles between a modern card-based layout and a minimalistic, simpler design.
FeatureFormSettings.errorFixBeforeSave: Please fix the errors before saving.
FeatureFormSettings.helperReservationLink: Reservation will be done via this external link.
FeatureFormSettings.helperPrice: The price will be displayed on the events page.
FeatureFormSettings.helperDeadlineDuration: Set how many days a user has to pay for an order. Leave empty for no deadline.
FeatureFormSettings.helperReminderEnabled: Automatically send an email reminder about payment.
FeatureFormSettings.helperReminderInterval: How many days before the deadline should the reminder be sent.
FeatureFormSettings.validationReminderInterval: Reminder interval must be less than the payment deadline.
FeatureFormSettings.subtitleEnableReminders: If enabled, an automatic email reminder about payment will be sent to customers.
FeatureFormSettings.subtitleRemindersDisabled: Reminders are disabled. Please enable the reminder feature in the occasion settings first.
FeatureFormSettings.helperStartingNumber: The first number in the sequence. Maximum 10 digits.
FeatureFormSettings.helperCommunicationTone: Select the tone for automated communications, like payment confirmation emails or reminders. This will affect the wording in the email templates.
FeatureFormSettings.customFontHelper: Paste the exact font title from Google Fonts (e.g. 'Roboto Condensed').
FeatureFormSettings.fontNotFound: Font not found. Please paste the exact name from fonts.google.com
FeatureFormSettings.reservationUnavailableMessage: Reservation for the selected event is currently unavailable.
FeatureFormSettings.errorEndTimeBeforeStartTime: End time cannot be before start time.
FeatureFormSettings.helperClosedMessage: Shown when form is closed / inactive.

ProductsDialog.sendUpdateContent: This will send an email to {email} with:

subs.platformLinks: Links for opening app on different platforms.
subs.resetLink: The link to reset the password
subs.changeOverview: An overview of changes in the order, such as added/removed items or price changes.
subs.balanceReasoning: A detailed explanation of the order balance, including payment status, amount due or overpaid, and payment instructions if applicable.
subs.name: Name
subs.paymentDetails: The payment details including account number, amount and variable symbol
subs.remainingTime: The remaining time until the deadline in days

usage.resetPassword_description: This template is used for sending password reset instructions.
usage.signInCode_description: This template is used for sending sign-in codes.
usage.ticketOrderConfirmation_description: This template is used to confirm ticket orders/registrations.
usage.ticketOrderUpdate_description: This template is used to send an updated order status to the customer, for example after products have been changed. It includes the current balance and payment instructions if needed.
usage.ticketOrderPaymentDone_description: This template is used to confirm successful ticket order/registration payments.
usage.ticketOrderPaymentReminder_description: This template is used to remind customers about pending ticket order/registration payments.
usage.ticketOrderStorno_description: This template is used to notify users about ticket order/registration cancellations.

settings.title: Email Settings
settings.bannerDescriptionOccasion: This image will be displayed at the top of all emails sent for this event.
settings.bannerDescriptionOrganization: This image will be displayed at the top of all emails sent from this organization, unless the event has its own banner.
settings.banner_hint: Tap to upload a new banner
settings.resetConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to reset this template to default? Custom content will be lost.

BankAccount.fioTokenInstruction: To enable automatic payments, enter your FIO API token. The token will be masked after saving.
BankAccount.checkAdminInfo: Admins can edit settings and view transactions.
BankAccount.description: Manage bank accounts for this organization. You can create new accounts, link existing ones, and set their priority.
BankAccount.leaveEmptyToKeepToken: Leave empty to keep current token
BankAccount.adminInfoText: Admins have full access to this account. They can pair payments with transactions, view history, and manage users.
BankAccount.addUserExplanation: Adding a user allows them to view and potentially manage this account (based on role). User must be registered first.
BankAccount.priorityTooltip: Determines the order of accounts. Lower numbers appear first.
BankAccount.priorityHelpContent: Priority determines the order in which accounts are displayed. You can reorder them by dragging.
BankAccount.removeAccountConfirmation: This will remove the bank account from this unit.
BankAccount.manageInSettings: You can manage accounts in organization settings.
BankAccount.addInSettings: You can add accounts in organization settings.
